title: Check-in/Check-out times
description:
Check-in from 14:00 until 22:00 
 Check-out from 05:00 until 11:00

title: Arrival at the property
description: Your host will meet you at the property to let you in.

title: Parking
description: Free private parking is available at a location nearby (reservation is needed).

title: Internet
description: WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.

title: Age restriction
description: There's no age requirement for check-in

title: No Curfew
description: Come and go whenever you want

title: Authorization
description: The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.

title: Accepted Credit Cards
description: No credit cards accepted, only cash

title: Quiet hours
description: Quiet hours are between 10:00 PM and 10:00 AM
